title: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley 'hurt' by what she saw on new episode of 'Jersey Shore'
text:
CLOSE "Jersey Shore" star Ronnie Ortiz-Magro is facing a felony kidnapping charge after an incident at his Hollywood Hills home involving his girlfriend Jen Harley. USA TODAY

Did we just witness a break up in real time?

Jenni “JWoww” Farley posted online on Thursday that she was not happy about what she saw on the evening's episode of “Jersey Shore Family Vacation.”

Specifically, she was upset about the interaction between fellow cast member Angelina Pivarnick and JWoww's new boyfriend, Zack Clayton Carpinello, aka “24.” Carpinello appeared to grab Angelina's backside while JWoww was all but passed out on Carpinello's lap during a night out in Las Vegas.

“After seeing tonight's episode I'm pretty hurt,” Farley wrote shortly after the episode aired. “I feel disrespected by someone I called a friend and by someone who stated they loved me.

“For 5 months I was kept in the dark about this. For 5 months I was naive, probably laughed at and made into a story line that will forever haunt me. My heart hurts on so many levels. One thing I learned from tonight's episode is know your value. Don't ever lower your standards.”

'Jersey Shore' Ronnie Ortiz-Magro tased, detained by police on domestic violence charges

'Jersey Shore's Jennifer 'JWoww' Farley reveals 24-year-old boyfriend: 'I'm living my best life'

Angelina literally got between JWoww and Carpinello on the episode, filmed at Drai’s Nightclub.

“She was all over him,” commented JWoww on her own post. “I saw her (backside) in his face. Real friend there. She was stirring the pot knowing it would end up on TV. If she was a true friend, she would have checked him and then came straight to me. She lived for the drama and straight disrespect.”

JWoww And Zack Clayton Carpinelllo in Las Vegas on Friday May 24, 2019. (Photo: Wolf Productions)

JWoww is in the process of finalizing the sale of her former Toms River home. The divorce of her and ex-husband Roger Mathews became official in August.

Carpinello quizzed Angelina about her sex life earlier in the show.

“One minute he's asking me about my sex life, the next minute he's grabbing me!” said Angelina to the producers. “He doesn't know what boundaries are. This is going to be a problem.”

You think?

“Took 5 months to see what really happened,' commented JWoww in a trailer post earlier on Thursday, “and 5 months of energy wasted.”

Next week, it's back to the Jersey Shore with a trip to the Headliner in Neptune.

description: Jenni “JWoww” Farley posted online that she was not happy about what she saw on the latest episode of “Jersey Shore Family Vacation.”
